@metadata.name: mw
@metadata.comment: The library is imported as default, it is "implied", and can be fully identified by its library prefix.

mw 001.description:
mw.addWarning( text )
 text - string with wikitext

mw 002.description:
mw.allToString( ... )
 calls tostring() on all args

mw 003.description:
mw.clone( value )
 value - any to be converted

mw 007.description:
mw.loadData( module )
 module - string identifying a page

mw 008.description:
mw.dumpObject( object )
 object - any to be serialized to readable form

mw 009.description:
mw.log( ... )
 calls tostring() on all args

mw 010.description:
mw.logObject( object [, prefix] )
 object - will be run through mw.dumpObject()
 prefix - string prepended to object
